Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm

Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatastoreOperations
    This interface specifies methods for interacting with a datastore.
    ModelFactory
    This interface provides an API for creating new instances of model classes from ORM query results.
    ResultSet
    This interface represents a result set from an SQL database query.
    Session
    Represents the lifecycle of an Infinitum persistence service and acts as an interface to a configured application datastore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LazyLoadDexMakerProxy
    Used to proxy an Object which has been configured to lazily load.
    ModelMap
    Represents a domain model instance mapped to a database table.
    ObjectMapper
    ObjectMapper provides an API for mapping domain objects to database tables and vice versa.
    OrmConstants
    Contains constants related to the Infinitum ORM.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OrmConstants.PersistenceMode
    Indicates the persistence state of a class or field.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm Description

Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
